paper_title: Impact of Motion Artefacts on OCR Accuracy
text: Motion artefacts such as blur and jitter significantly affect OCR accuracy in real-world image capture scenarios.

paper_title: Impact of Motion Artefacts on OCR Accuracy
text: Experimental evaluation shows a substantial drop in OCR accuracy under conditions of motion blur and camera shake.
Image stabilization and deblurring techniques improve OCR robustness in dynamic environments.
